entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Blind River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:05 a.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 2.3Â°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 10 mm. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to snow or rain overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
